Docs.summary: Represents a dialog box for a dynamic argument element.

public static bool ShowDialog (System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem activity, System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem data, System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext context, System.Windows.DependencyObject owner, System.Activities.Presentation.DynamicArgumentDesignerOptions options);

.method public static hidebysig bool ShowDialog(class System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem activity, class System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem data, class System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext context, class System.Windows.DependencyObject owner, class System.Activities.Presentation.DynamicArgumentDesignerOptions options) cil managed

Docs.param: The activity associated with the dynamic argument dialog.
The data associated with the dynamic argument dialog.
The editing context associated with the dynamic argument dialog.
The owner of the dynamic argument dialog.
The options of the dynamic argument designer that contain the argument prefix and the designer title. The dynamic argument dialog contains the designer as its content.
Docs.summary: Displays the dynamic argument dialog with **OK** and **Cancel** buttons and returns after the dialog is closed.
Docs.returns: if the user accepted the dialog; if the user cancelled the dialog.
